definition: Peer-to-peer payment transactions received by the organization from external sources via VPA (Virtual Payment Address)
Virtual Payment Address used for digital payments in UPI (Unified Payments Interface) system
Payment Service Provider that facilitates digital payment transactions
Count of transactions that occurred on the previous day (current_date - 1 day)
Count of transactions that occurred on the current date
Count of transactions that occurred on the same day of the previous month (current_date - 1 month)
Percentage change in transaction count from yesterday to today, calculated as (Today's Txns / Yesterday's Txns) - 1

term: Today vs Last month Same Day
definition: Percentage change in transaction count from same day last month to today, calculated as (Today's Txns / Last Month Same Day Txns) - 1
Payment Service Provider associated with the transaction recipient (payee)
Payment Service Provider associated with the transaction sender (payer)
HDFC Bank Payment Service Provider transactions identified by 'pthdfc' handle
Axis Bank Payment Service Provider transactions identified by 'ptaxis' handle
State Bank of India Payment Service Provider transactions identified by 'ptsbi' handle
Paytm Yes Bank Payment Service Provider transactions identified by 'ptyes' handle
Unique identifier for each transaction record in the system
